oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of mass meeting, Fisk University, Nashville, Tennessee, with Guy Carawan leading song on guitar, 1960 April 21
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of members of the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and Guy Carawan of the Highlander Folk School at a mass meeting at Fisk University, Nashville, Tennessee, April 21, 1960, following the bombing of attorney Z. Alexander Looby's home. Guy Carawan is credited with teaching many of the Nashville student leaders the song "We Shall Overcome." Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carawan, Guy; Lewis, John, 1940 Feb. 21- ; Alexander, Peggi; Walker, Matthew; Looby, Z. Alexander (Zephaniah Alexander), 1899-
Fisk University; Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee (U.S.); Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.)
